content: this legal text discusses the progress of a divorce case between mr vb and his wife the document mentions a prior agreement for an extension of time arrangement involving 7 blades the notary mr vb who works for a company called notaris vb is handling the proceedings the text states that the partners got married under the legal regime of community property and have children together they also have other children born through a different procedure the partners have reached an agreement regarding their mutual rights and property including personal belongings financial accounts and debts they have renounced certain rights in the event of one spouses death the text also includes an agreement regarding the arrangements for their children including housing arrangements parental authority and financial contributions it mentions the possibility of wage authorization in case of nonpayment of maintenance the document explains the process of recovering maintenance arrears and the possibility of reviewing custody arrangements and maintenance in case of new circumstances in a divorce by mutual consent neither spouse is required to pay maintenance to the other the costs and fees related to the divorce proceedings are to be shared equally the document becomes binding once the divorce is pronounced and all parties involved have confirmed their understanding of their rights and obligations
